predictions.text: From 2025-09-03 close to 2025-09-30 close, Alphabet Inc. Class A (GOOGL) will outperform SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust (SPY) by at least 2.0 percentage points based on percentage change in adjusted close prices.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use adjusted close prices from a consistent source (e.g., Yahoo Finance). Compute percentage change from 2025-09-03 close to 2025-09-30 close for GOOGL and SPY; GOOGL must exceed SPY by >=2.0 percentage points.
evidence: Judge orders Google to share data/end exclusivity but avoids breakup; core search intact; Alphabet rallied.
monitoring_signals: Further remedies or appeals affecting Google search defaults
Ad demand trends and search volume data
Peers’ performance (MSFT, META) and Nasdaq breadth
Rates moves impacting mega-cap duration sensitivity
predictions.rationale: Antitrust remedy avoided structural breakup; relief rally and reduced tail risk favor near-term outperformance.

predictions.text: From 2025-09-03 close to 2025-10-15 close, PepsiCo (PEP) will outperform Coca-Cola (KO) by at least 3.0 percentage points based on percentage change in adjusted close prices.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use adjusted close prices from a consistent source (e.g., Yahoo Finance). Compute percentage change from 2025-09-03 close to 2025-10-15 close for PEP and KO; PEP must exceed KO by >=3.0 percentage points.
evidence: Elliott takes ~$4B stake in PepsiCo, pushing for portfolio/capital allocation changes; activism often catalyzes relative outperformance.
monitoring_signals: Public letters, board changes, or asset review announcements from PEP
Buyback or margin targets vs KO commentary
Staples sector flows and defensive rotation dynamics
Commodity input costs (sugar, aluminum) and FX exposure
predictions.rationale: Fresh activist catalyst at PEP vs. KO’s steadier profile should drive relative rerating near term.

predictions.text: The U.S. 30-Year Treasury yield (FRED: DGS30) will close at or above 5.05% on at least one trading day by 2025-09-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify with FRED series DGS30 daily close. Success if any observation on or before 2025-09-30 is >= 5.05%.
evidence: 30-year yield topped ~4.97% amid tariff refund risks and supply concerns.
monitoring_signals: Treasury refunding details and long-end auction demand
Inflation prints (CPI, PCE) and oil prices
Fed communications on balance sheet and cuts
Term premium estimates and curve moves
predictions.rationale: Rising term premium, supply, and inflation uncertainty make a marginal new high plausible.

predictions.text: From 2025-09-03 close to 2025-10-15 close, Salesforce (CRM) will underperform Invesco QQQ Trust (QQQ) by at least 4.0 percentage points based on percentage change in adjusted close prices.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use adjusted close prices from a consistent source (e.g., Yahoo Finance). Compute percentage change from 2025-09-03 close to 2025-10-15 close for CRM and QQQ; CRM must lag QQQ by >=4.0 percentage points.
evidence: Salesforce to cut ~4,000 jobs; investors pressing for faster AI-driven growth amid margin focus.
monitoring_signals: CRM guidance commentary and AI product monetization updates
Large-cap AI leaders’ momentum (NVDA, MSFT) lifting QQQ
Enterprise IT spending surveys and deal cycles
USD strength impacting SaaS FX headwinds
predictions.rationale: Layoffs highlight growth trade-offs; mega-cap AI leaders may keep pulling QQQ ahead of legacy SaaS.

predictions.text: By 2025-09-30, the U.S. Treasury’s OFAC will announce at least one new sanctions designation targeting Venezuelan individuals, entities, or vessels via a public press release or sanctions list update.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm via treasury.gov official OFAC press releases or SDN/GL updates explicitly referencing Venezuela between 2025-09-03 and 2025-09-30 (UTC).
evidence: Escalating U.S.-Venezuela tensions after reported lethal maritime incident and rhetorical escalation.
monitoring_signals: White House/State Department statements on Venezuela
US Coast Guard or DoD updates on maritime incidents
Regional diplomatic responses (OAS, Colombia, Brazil)
OFAC enforcement cadence in Latin America
predictions.rationale: Sanctions are a common U.S. policy tool amid rising tensions without immediate military escalation.

predictions.text: The Drewry World Container Index Composite published on or before 2025-09-26 will be at least 8% higher than the 2025-08-29 reading.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use Drewry’s weekly WCI composite index values. Compare the latest reading published on or before 2025-09-26 to 2025-08-29; require >=+8.0%.
evidence: Heightened Red Sea/Gulf of Aden risks strain capacity; route-specific rates already rising.
monitoring_signals: UKMTO incident reports in Red Sea/Bab el-Mandeb
Carrier surcharges, blank sailings, and port congestion updates
Fuel prices (bunker) and Suez diversions
China export trends and U.S./EU demand indicators
predictions.rationale: Security disruptions and demand resilience should lift composite shipping rates near term.

predictions.text: By 2025-09-27, U.S. Core PCE price index m/m (seasonally adjusted) for August 2025 will be between 0.2% and 0.3%.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify in BEA’s Personal Income and Outlays news release for August 2025. Use the monthly percent change of PCE excluding food and energy (SA). Must be >=0.2% and <=0.3%.
evidence: Labor data and services inflation moderating; consensus for stable core momentum.
BlackRock notes 60/40 risks tied to rates/inflation but not deflationary collapse.
monitoring_signals: CPI core services ex-shelter proxies and PPI for core goods
Wage indicators (AHE, ECI) and job openings
Shelter inflation trajectory
Healthcare price revisions in PCE
predictions.rationale: Core inflation trend remains sticky but easing, making a 0.2–0.3% print most likely.

predictions.text: On at least one trading day by 2025-09-10, CME FedWatch will show a combined probability at or below 20% for a 50 bp or larger cut at the September 2025 FOMC meeting.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check CME FedWatch Tool snapshots for the Sep 2025 meeting. Sum probabilities for -50 bps or more; success if any trading day through 2025-09-10 shows <=20%. Archive/screenshot acceptable.
evidence: Rising long-end yields and firm services inflation reduce likelihood of an outsized cut.
monitoring_signals: NFP, unemployment rate, and AHE prints
ISM Services Prices Paid and PMI
Fed speakers guiding toward gradualism
Market risk sentiment and credit spreads
predictions.rationale: Markets likely fade extreme cut odds ahead of key data and as yields rise.
